description:
Our pressure-proof titanium camera housings are equipped with a window on the front and with connectors on the rear side.
You can choose between a plain window or a cone shaped one made of bore silicate glass, perspex or sapphire with an opening angle of 2 times 44 degrees, particularly suitable for macro images.
We also offer complete technical systems with e. g. digital camcorder & recorder, micro color cameras PAL & NTSC, internal electronics, power supply and software.
We design and manufacture camera housings according to your specific requirements regarding length, equipment, operation depth and other specifications.
